name: Life of a debugger
description:
A sorta fast paced shooter where your job as a debugger is to fight off the pesky errors! If there are to many errors spawned you will get a game over, and also watch out for the warning enemies, who will slow you down if you touch them. W, A, S, and D to move, space to jump, hold shift + W to run, and left click to fire. This game is still in progress, and might receive updates if it gets enough feedback. Please comment if you have questions, feedback, found glitches or bugs, cannot download the game, or any other reason.

Sound Effects found at soundjay.com

music - Echoes by Yung Logos
